# VNeID QR Scanner App - Copilot Instructions

This is a React TypeScript application for scanning VNeID QR codes for visitor check-in at Thổ Chu Island, Kiên Giang, Vietnam.

## Project Context
- **Purpose**: Police-operated visitor check-in system
- **Target**: Vietnam Citizen ID (VNeID) QR code scanning
- **Design**: Fresh, friendly, and professional interface
- **Technology**: React + TypeScript + QR Scanner

## Key Features
- Scan VNeID QR codes to extract citizen information
- Form display with auto-populated data from QR scan
- Manual input fields for temporary residence and notes
- Professional UI suitable for police operations
- Submit functionality (backend integration TBD)

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement responsive design for tablet/mobile use
- Ensure accessibility for government operations
- Use modern React patterns (hooks, functional components)
- Implement proper error handling for QR scan failures
